remarks: A version of the existential uniqueness definition with a hypothesis instead of a distinct variable condition.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Aug-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 30-Oct-2018.)
statement:
euf.1 $e |- F/ y ph $.
euf $p |- ( E! x ph <-> E. y A. x ( ph <-> x = y ) ) $.
$d x y $.
